text: Selfish genes or selfish genetic elements are genetic segments that can enhance their own transmission at the expense of other genes in the genome. Selfish gene may also refer to: *Selfish gene theory, the gene-centered view of evolution *The Selfish Gene, a book by Richard Dawkins discussing the selfish gene theory *"Selfish Gene", a song by Panda Bear from the album Panda Bear Meets the Grim Reaper ==See also== *"Selfish Jean", a song by Travis
